description: Detects suspicious DACL modifications to deny access to a service that affects critical trustees. This can be used to hide services or make them unstoppable.
author: Jonhnathan Ribeiro
oscd.community
name: Deny Service Access Using Security Descriptor Tampering Via Sc.EXE
query: (((process.executable.text:"*\\sc.exe") OR (winlog.event_data.OriginalFileName:"sc.exe")) AND (process.command_line.text:"*sdset*" AND process.command_line.text:"*D;*") AND process.command_line.text:("*;IU*" OR "*;SU*" OR "*;BA*" OR "*;SY*" OR "*;WD*"))
